name: Woof and Meow Guide to Hong Kong - New edition
description:
The Woof and Meow Guide to Hong Kong covers everything dog and cat related so that you and your pet can enjoy life in Hong Kong to the full.

Written by rescue dog Padstow (with a little help from his owners and feline friend Miss Elle) the guide covers vets, shops, dog friendly bars and restaurants, walks, groomers, kennels and much much more.  You'll even find an animal communicator, a doggy modelling agency and venues for your dog's next birthday party!  

There's also useful information about importing and exporting pets, dogs and the law, how to get around Hong Kong with your pet and other need-to-knows. 

WE DONATE $10 FROM THE SALE OF EACH GUIDE TO HELP DOGS AND CATS LESS FORTUNATE THAN PADSTOW AND MISS ELLE.  THE DONATIONS WILL BE SPLIT EVENLY BETWEEN ANIMALS ASIA AND SPCA.

FREE SHIPPING WITHIN HONG KONG ON ALL OUR ITEMS

name: Mutt Genie Dog Breed / DNA Test Kit
description:
Ever been asked “What kind of dog is that?”

Ever wondered the same yourself?

If you own a mixed breed dog, we bet the answer is yes to both questions!

Well, now you can find out the breeds present in your dog, by asking the Mutt Genie! 

Collect your dog’s DNA at home using a simple and harmless cheek swab, put it in the post to the Mutt Genie and he’ll do the rest!  The results will be sent to you approximately one month after you submit your swabs.

For more info visit www.muttgenie.com

We donate $100 from every sale to animal welfare organisations in Hong Kong. Our current charity of the month is listed on the Donations (Q&A) page.

FREE SHIPPING WITHIN HONG KONG ON ALL OUR ITEMS

name: Handcrafted Sterling Silver dog tag - 3 sizes - customised for your dog
description:
For the dog that has almost everything - a circular sterling silver dog tag.

3 sizes:  large - 1 inch diameter; medium - 7/8 inch diameter; small - 3/4 inch diameter.

After ordering, please email your dog's name and your phone number to animalsinphotos@gmail.com   You can also choose one of the following icons: pawprint, dog bone; dog face or heart.

The tag will arrive by post in approximately one week. 

Please note that this is a handcrafted item and the letters may not be completely straight and even.  This is part of the natural beauty of the tag, making it truly one of a kind, just like your dog, and just like your dog's unique features, should not be considered a fault!

We donate 10% from every sale to animal welfare organisations in Hong Kong.  Our current charity of the month is listed on the Donations (Q&A) page.

FREE SHIPPING WITHIN HONG KONG ON ALL OUR ITEMS

(PAYPAL NOTE: If you are new paypal you need to set the language to English on your profile, otherwise it will default to Chinese for Hong Kong.)

name: Pugs Not Drugs Tote Bag
description:
Get your own Gemma Correll original and never be caught at the shops without your own bag.  Folds up small so you can carry it with you until you need.

This is no ordinary shopper.  Its super cute "Pugs not Drugs message" printed on it using environmentally friendly inks. The high quality tote bag is made from 100% organic cotton and is Climate Neutral having been manufactured solely using renewable green energy from wind and solar power.  

We give $15 for each sale to local animal charities. Our current charity of the month is listed on the Donations (Q&A) page.

name: SALE! Handbag Hook for dog lovers!
description:
NEW YEAR SALE! SAVE $50!

Thanks to this cute doggy there will be no more putting your handbag on a dirty floor when you are out and about with friends.  

It sits flat in your handbag in its own velvet pooch when not in use.  When it's needed, just give your command the doggy will spring to action to rest on the table top, with a hook for you to hand your bag on.  

A lovely present for dog lovers, or just treat yourself!  

We donate $10 (during sale period) from every sale to animal welfare organisations in Hong Kong.   Our current charity of the month is listed on the Donations (Q&A) page.

FREE SHIPPING WITHIN HONG KONG ON ALL OUR ITEMS
